text:
(1) Looking south east, from Ave. A Manhattan; at the Queensboro Bridge.
September 15, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same view, from the N.W. corner of York Ave., and 64th Street, four years later.
June 30, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) Queensboro Bridge from N.E. corner of First Ave., and 61st Street, nine years later.
June 16, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bridges - Queensboro [Queensborough] Bridge.
